meanings.sent1: The teleologically driven process ensured the desired outcome.
meanings.sent2: The scientist approached the problem from a teleologically focused perspective.
meanings.sent3: The teleologically designed robot always followed its programmed purpose.
meanings.sent4: Her teleologically planned route led her straight to the treasure.
meanings.sent5: The teleologically structured organization achieved its goals efficiently.

meanings.definition: In a manner that is teleological.
meanings.sent1: She approached the project teleologically, with the end goal in mind.
meanings.sent2: The system was set up teleologically to ensure optimal performance.
meanings.sent3: He comically tried to eat his sandwich teleologically, starting from the middle.
meanings.sent4: The river flowed teleologically towards the sea, following its natural course.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted teleologically, focusing on the final masterpiece in every brushstroke.
